programme.title: Cooku With Komali
programme.desc: Celebrity pairs, made up of an expert cook and a novice, bring their culinary wonders to the table to score points with professional chef judges Venkatesh Bhat and Chef Damodharan.

programme.title: Super Singer
programme.desc: Judges seek to discover the biggest singing talents and playback recordings throughout a series of auditions. Contestants participate in several rounds, featuring a special theme each week.

programme.title: Anda Ka Kasam
programme.desc: Featuring Madurai Muthu, Ramar, Thangadurai, Aadhavan, Nanjil Vijayan, and Vinoth KPY.

programme.title: Kallakal Champions
programme.desc: The talented comedians of `Kalakka Povadhu Yaaru' perform lively stand-up acts.

programme.title: Start Music
programme.desc: The hosts assign television stars and celebrities who are split up into teams challenges which are to perform all kinds of musical games and musical tasks in order to win the prize.

programme.title: Pandian Stores
programme.desc: Dhanalakshmi, a young woman, deeply cares for her brothers-in-law and takes care of the household affairs. However, the family is soon forced to deal with various conflicts in life.

programme.desc: Celebrity pairs, made up of an expert cook and a novice, bring their culinary wonders to the table to score points with professional chef judges Venkatesh Bhat and Chef Damodharan.

programme.title: Siragadikka Aasai
programme.desc: An alcoholic who is drunk throughout the day meets a sweet, gentle girl who works in a flower shop.

programme.title: Mahanadhi Sagodharigalin Kadhai
programme.desc: When a family loses their father, the sole member of their lives, they take it as a challenge to rise back stronger in all situations.

programme.title: Mouna Raagam
programme.desc: A young, talented village girl with a gift for music has an estranged musician father. She challenges herself to become more successful than him.

programme.title: Thamizhum Saraswathiyum
programme.desc: Saraswathi is frowned upon for not studying, and decides to get married to escape from the constant criticism from her father for not studying properly. However, the prospect grooms demand more money to marry her since she's an uneducated girl.

programme.title: Raja Rani
programme.desc: From her humble beginnings as a maidservant, Semba establishes herself as the suitable daughter-in-law of the house.

programme.title: Eeramaana Rojaavey 2
programme.desc: Circumstances force Vetri to marry his deceased brother's bride, Malarvizhi. Together, they overcome family and societal pressures to live a happy married life.

programme.title: Baagyalatchumi Illatharisiyin Kadhai
programme.desc: A dutiful wife, doting mother, and myriad other roles perfected, Baakiyalakshmi still faces criticism at the hands of her family.

programme.desc: Dhanalakshmi, a young woman, deeply cares for her brothers-in-law and takes care of the household affairs. However, the family is soon forced to deal with various conflicts in life.

programme.title: Bharathi Kannamma
programme.desc: The course of love does not run smooth for Dr Barathi and a kind-hearted Kannamma, who is hated for her dark complexion. The couple must work through scornful family members and an orthodox society to live a happy married life.

programme.title: Kaatrukenna Veli S P V I P K
programme.desc: Vennila's father burns her dreams to ashes when he makes the decision to get her married. Vennila's mother then convinces her to run away from home, and she ends up in the city where she can study.

programme.desc: A woman aspiring to become a doctor faces the myriad struggles of married life.

programme.desc: Karthik and Meenakshi, two youngsters, meet each other during a family function and instantly dislike each other, but their respective families think otherwise and consider getting them married.
